com.vistamaresoft.rwgui

Class RWGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.risingworld.api.Plugin
      • com.vistamaresoft.rwgui.RWGui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.risingworld.api.events.Listener

    public class RWGui
extends net.risingworld.api.Plugin
implements net.risingworld.api.events.Listener
    A 'holding' class with global definitions and ancillary utilities for the whole plug-in.

    Important: due to the way Rising World plug-ins are loaded, none of the classes of this package (GuiDialogueBox, GuiLayout and its sub-classes, GuiMenu and GuiUsersMenu, GuiModelessWindow, GuiTitleBar) can be used from within the onEnable() method of a plug-in, as it is impossible to be sure that, at that moment, this plug-in has already been loaded.

    The first moment one can be sure that all plug-ins have been loaded is when the first player connects to the server (either dedicated or local).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RWGui.Pair<L,R>
      A utility class to hold two related objects.
      static interface  RWGui.RWGuiCallback
      An interface for the callback objects reporting click and text entry events to menus, dialogue boxes and similar.

      • setImage

        public static int setImage(net.risingworld.api.gui.GuiImage image,
                           int iconId)
        Sets one of the stock icon image into a GuiImage element.
        Parameters:
        image - the GuiImage to set the icon image into
        iconId - the id of the icon
        Returns:
        INVALID_PARAMETER if iconId is out of range; SUCCESS otherwise.

      • getTextWidth

        public static float getTextWidth(java.lang.String text,
                                 float fontSize)
        Returns (an estimate of) the width of a GuiLabel text. Assumes the default font is used.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to measure
        fontSize - the size of the font used
        Returns:
        an estimate of the text width in pixels corresponding to the given font size

      • getElementSizes

        public static net.risingworld.api.utils.Vector2i getElementSizes(net.risingworld.api.gui.GuiElement element)
        Returns the x, y sizes of a GuiElement as a Vector2i. Required to support (at least approximately) getHeight() and getWidth() for GuiLabel too.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to measure
        Returns:
        the x and y sizes of the element as a Vector2i
